Learning Management System

Application Developer (08/2020 - Current)

Goal:

Develop a learning management system for Korean Universities.

Scope:

6 people

Strategies:

  • https://campus.knowlipop.com

  • Communicate closely to international colleague to clearify the requirements.

  • Analyze and estimate tasks duration.

  • Develop LTI (plugins) services to integrate with the LMS using NodeJs, ExpressJs, NestJs, TypeScript.

  • Develop background jobs queue API for large-file processing.

  • Multilingual support with existed Ruby-ReactJs system.

  • Write unit testing, end-to-end testing for the backend APIs.

  • Manage data with MongoDb and Mongoose ORM, PostGreSQL.

  • Structure project architectural design with DDD clean architectural design pattern.

  • Design and implement Distributed architectural design for backend services.
